So did the ability to configure the upgradeable buildings make it in? I've been looking through the game folder and haven't seen any config files related to that system yet.
90% Finish! Finish! Go! You can do it!
I am going to be so excited when I get home. Drop everything, run upstairs, load up the game which had probably already been downloaded by steam... Ah yes. This will be good.
It's loading!

I love the 'Launch Video'.

In typical Kerbal style it burns off in style, ramps up to heroics and ends in disaster.

Followed by a jolly "It's never been easier!".

It's so brilliant that it can't be viewed without shades.

I feel everybody around me should be celebrating like it's new years eve, but alas, it's just a Monday to most people. I'm still doing backflips though! We did it guys! Ahhhhh, I don't really even know what to say I'm so excited!
So the old chase cam is still in? That is great news. I'm at least three hours out from opening the game myself and can't wait!

I'm not really liking how certain contracts only come up in fixed order. Why do I have to perform an orbital rendezvous around Kerbin before I can get a mission to circularize around and/or land on the Mun? Does not compute. I mean sure, that matches human space flight progress better, but it limits players new and old alike with rather arbitrary requirements which ultimately just cheat you out of a lot of funds, science, and reputation if you decide to do things any way but the "expected" way. Definite suggestion for 1.0.1: make all of the World-Firsts contracts into auto-contracts. It makes zero sense otherwise. "Oh, you landed on the Mun already? We expected you to rendezvous first, so you don't get squat! Sorry!"

Not excited, can't download it from anywhere

Very Upset
I remember when all this was fields.
And we Launched rockets from a dirt patch in the center. With only 3 parts we went to the moon and beyond

I've already begun experimenting with my open-cockpit jets again. The Banshee's performance, once upgraded to turbojets, has vastly improved. So happy.

Omg love everything you guys did with the camera! Chasecam is so cool and the wobble really intensifies everything, you can now almost feel how your vessel handles! The alt scroll, is that new or did I just never noticed that? It is great for taking some awesome screenshots! 

Already awesome and I havent even checked every feature and part yet!

It's kind of dissapointing for me. For some reason the game just doesn't feel finished. It feels rushed a lot. The resource system feel uninspired and cheap. Just one resource which can be converted to fuel. The engine names seem tacked on and forced. Seriously, Rhino? Mammoth? Spider? Kickback?
